short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a QR code for the current web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Website to QR Code Generator - Quick and Easy QR Code Creation

Generate QR codes for any webpage instantly with our user-friendly Chrome extension. Whether you need a QR code for a website, a document, or any other URL, our extension makes it simple and fast.

Features:
	•	Instant QR Code Generation: Quickly generate a QR code for any active webpage with a single click.
	•	Customizable Colors: Personalize your QR code by choosing your favorite color using the built-in color picker.
	•	Copy to Clipboard: Easily copy the generated QR code to your clipboard for quick sharing or embedding.
	•	Download as Image: Download the QR code as a PNG image directly to your device for offline use.

How to Use:
	1.	Install the Extension: Add the QR Code Generator to your Chrome browser.
	2.	Open a Webpage: Navigate to any webpage you want to generate a QR code for.
	3.	Click the Extension Icon: Click on the QR Code Generator icon in your Chrome toolbar.
	4.	Customize (Optional): Use the color picker to change the QR code color.
	5.	Copy or Download: Click ‘Copy’ to copy the QR code to your clipboard or ‘Download’ to save it as an image.

Perfect For:
	•	Sharing URLs via QR codes
	•	Creating QR codes for promotional materials
	•	Quickly accessing websites on mobile devices
	•	Enhancing presentations with QR codes

Why Choose Our Extension?
	•	No Ads: Enjoy a seamless experience without interruptions.
	•	Lightweight: Our extension is designed to be lightweight and fast.
	•	User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive interface for hassle-free QR code generation.

Get started today and make sharing links easier than ever with our QR Code Generator!

Feel free to adjust this description to better suit your needs or add any additional features and benefits you want to highlight.
